pullRequest.title: HDDS-3374. Addendum: OMVolumeSetOwnerRequest doesn't check if user is already the owner
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
The previous PR #806 's unit test didn't expose the potential NPE issue that the removed integration test would have exposed: the flushFuture isn't set so this line would raise NPE.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-3374
How was this patch tested?
Would add back the integration test if needed.

commit.message: Call addResponseToDoubleBuffer so the client won't NPE at omClientResponse.getFlushFuture().get().
Fix checkstyle. - We should refactor the function later.
Add back test TestOzoneManagerSetOwner. But improved.

nodes.bodyText: Can we add this test in TestOzoneRpcClient?
Instead of return response here, set it to omClientResponse, and let finally block take care of it.

commit.message: Simplify the fix: Let finally block take care of addResponseToDoubleBuffer.

nodes.bodyText: Minor NIT: We don't need this comment, as this PR fixes the bug in the code :)
